conclusion: The detector's speed is adjustable and moves along the x-axis with velocity inversely proportional to displacement.
The image shows a line along the x-axis from origin O to points A and B.
Velocity v is inversely proportional to displacement x, so v = k/x.
Using velocity at point B (2 m/s) and displacement (2 m), k is calculated as 4.
Using velocity at point A (4 m/s), displacement from O to A is calculated as 1 m.
Time to move from A to B is calculated as 0.25 s using displacement and velocity.
